name: Karaokey
description:
[Game currently in beta]

Have fun typing along to the lyrics of a variety of songs. Each song's type-along has been carefully crafted to feel like you're singing along with your fingers. 

Currently featuring 4 songs (under CC license):

  • I'm Your Moon - Jonathan Coulton
  • Let it In - Josh Woodward
  • Code Monkey - Jonathan Coulton
  • The Most - Ancient Free Gardeners

Songs are available to be played at 3 vastly different difficulties. 

Thoughts and comments greatly appreciated.  

Game written in Godot and borrowed significantly from open source project Steno Arcade.
